fg_segments: Privacy Policy Monster Crawler, Inc. does not collect any personally identifiable information about you such as name, address, phone number, or e-mail address.

However, Monster Crawler, Inc. does obtain some types of non-personally identifiable information such as the Internet Service Provider you use to connect to the Internet, your browser type, or the type of computer operating system you use (Macintosh or Windows, for example).
The information we collect is used to improve the content of our website.
© 1999-2017 Monster Crawler Incorporated All Rights Reserved. About Advertise Press Privacy Policy Terms of Use

Privacy Policy
Monster Crawler, Inc. does not collect any personally identifiable information about you such as name, address, phone number, or e-mail address. However, Monster Crawler, Inc. does obtain some types of non-personally identifiable information such as the Internet Service Provider you use to connect to the Internet, your browser type, or the type of computer operating system you use (Macintosh or Windows, for example). The information we collect is used to improve the content of our website.
